participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Driven and detail-oriented, often putting work before personal life. Enjoys the simple pleasures of life yet feels the weight of responsibilities.
participant_1.background: I think i need a vacation. I take forever to get tasks done so i start early and clock out late. I work too much. I am a perfectionist. If things are not done right i will redo them again and again.

participant_2.name: Jasper
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, enjoys expressing himself through his craft. Loves adventure and the sea, and values personal connections.
participant_2.background: I am a hair stylist. I live on a boat. I have my own salon. My hair is colored purple. I got married last year.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a hair stylist.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to be a hair stylist.
It's a lot of fun. I love getting to create new looks for people.
I bet! Do you have your own salon?
Yes, I do. I live on a boat and my salon is in the back.
That's awesome! I've never seen a hair salon on a boat before.
It's a lot of fun. I get to see the ocean every day.
That's great! I love the ocean.
Me too! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a perfectionist. I work too much and I think I need a vacation.
Oh, that's not good. You need to take some time for yourself.
I know, I know. I'm trying to schedule one soon.
Good. You deserve it.
Thanks.
No problem. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the beach, read, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds like fun. I like to do a lot of the same things.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
Sure, that would be fun.
